short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extenstion Allows You to add Count Down timer on Events, So you Can keep track on dates of the event

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to add a countdown timer to events, enabling users to effectively monitor event dates.

To use the extension, add it, then pin it to the toolbar. Each time you click on the icon, you will be able to see the countdown or add a new one.

Visit my blog: bloginfinite.com
